verses.verse: The fool <WH5036> has said <WH559> in his heart, <WH3820> "There is no God. <WH430>" They are corrupt, <WH7843> and have done abominable <WH8581> iniquity. <WH5766> There is no one who does <WH6213> good. <WH2896>
God <WH430> looks down <WH8259> from heaven <WH8064> on the children <WH1121> of men, <WH120> to see <WH7200> if there are <WH3426> any who understood, <WH7919> who seek <WH1875> after God. <WH430>
Every one of them has gone back. <WH5472> They have become filthy <WH444> together. <WH3162> There is no one who does <WH6213> good, <WH2896> no, <WH259> not one.
Have the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> no knowledge, <WH3045> who eat up <WH398> my people <WH5971> as they eat <WH398> bread, <WH3899> and don't <WH7121> call on God? <WH430>

There they were in great <WH6343> fear, <WH6342> where no fear <WH6343> was, <WH430> for God has scattered <WH6340> the bones <WH6106> of him who encamps <WH2583> against you. <WH954> You have put them to shame, because God <WH430> has rejected them. <WH3988>

Oh that <WH5414> the salvation <WH3444> of Israel <WH3478> would come out of Zion! <WH6726> When God <WH430> brings back <WH7725> his people <WH5971> from captivity, <WH7622> then Jacob <WH3290> shall rejoice, <WH1523> and Israel <WH3478> shall be glad. <WH8055>
